Plot: Follows the workers of struggling advertising agency Bitt Propaganda after opening a new headquarters on the brink of bankruptcy.
Title: Agora Sim!
Writer: Rodrigo Castilho, Fabio Danesi, Luca Paiva Mello, João Daniel Tikhomiroff
Actors: Fábio Herford, Amanda Lyra, Augusto Madeira, Larissa Machado
